DOC.detailed_description: A number nutritional strategy develop optimize nutrient delivery prior exercise . This include provide carbohydrate number ergogenic nutrient prior , and/or follow exercise . As result , number pre-workout supplement develop increase energy availability , promote vasodilation and/or positively affect exercise capacity . The purpose study investigate effect ingest pre-workout dietary supplement resistance train train adaptation .
DOC.criteria: apparently healthy recreationally active male age 18 40. need least six month immediate prior history resistance training bench press leg press squat . history treatment metabolic disease ( i.e. , diabetes ) , hypertension , hypotension , thyroid disease , arrhythmia and/or cardiovascular disease ; currently use prescription medication ; intolerance caffeine and/or natural stimulant ; history smoking ; drink excessively ( i.e. , 12 drink per week ) ;
